title: Object
description: Describes a Media Object in the service instance.

referenced_by_flows.description: List of Flows that reference this Media Object via Flow Segments in this service instance.

first_referenced_by_flow.description: The first Flow that had a Flow Segment reference the Media Object in this service instance. This Flow is also present in 'referenced_by_flows' if it is still referenced by the Flow. This property is optional and may, in some service implementations, become unset if the Flow no longer references the Media Object, e.g. because it was deleted.
